name: 7 Didn't 8 9
description:
In a room full of clones, who killed Number 9?

7 Didn’t 8 9 is a murder-mystery adventure game where you play as Number 7, one of nine clones currently in testing at the Torib-Redd Cloning Facility. When fellow clone Number 9 is killed one night, you must figure out which of the other seven clones did it – or the entire batch of clones is going to be labeled “defective” and scrapped.

Story by Will Ridenour

Programming by Joe Pagliuco, Joe Mistretta, and J Rave

Character Art by Danielle Benthien

UI by Kalynn Ogle

Audio by J Rave

Additional Art by Rebecca Schultz

This game was originally created as part of a 3 day game jam.
